title: Cant find my Mystery gift
body:
Hey riot or anyone who is willing to help. 

I just logged on and noticed I recieved an icon (poro with the great hat) and also a pop up regarding a mystery gift. 

I clicked the only option of "Awesome!" yet I dont even know what I got. lol 

Hope someone will read this and help me out! 

Thanks!

replies.body: It looks like there were some ghost notifications going out for the mystery gifts for those who already own Riot Kayle. The real notification should still be going out as you receive the gift. If you haven't been gifted by the 23rd, please let me know.
Don't worry same here.. Got the icon but no mystery gift for having the kaylee skin already :/ {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
